text: Fame can be just so annoying because people are so critical of you. You can't just say, 'hi'. You say hi and people whisper' man did you see the way she said hi? What an attitude.
author: Juliette Lewis

text: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.
author: Warwick Davis

text: The attitude and capacity of the factory, the old metal table and the new ideas of the wooden furniture quickly and naturally suggested the possibility of metal furniture.
author: Donald Judd

text: You can measure a programmer's perspective by noting his attitude on the continuing vitality of FORTRAN.
author: Alan Perlis

text: Let us change our traditional attitude to the construction of programs. Instead of imagining that our main task is to instruct a computer what to do, let us concentrate rather on explaining to human beings what we want a computer to do.
author: Donald Knuth
